Description: Cozy & Convenient 4BR Apartment in Inman Square. First, Security & Broker's, & Last due at lease signing. Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this newly renovated 4-bedroom apartment in Inman Square. Close to Harvard, MIT, and Cambridge College, this charming space is steps away from shops, dining, and public transport. With shared parking, laundry, and utilities included, it's ready for you to move in and make it your own. Don't miss out schedule a viewing today!
